items.content: Shiv Brass Industries stands as a beacon of excellence in the brass manufacturing sector. Founded in 1985, we have consistently delivered high-quality forged brass components to automotive, aerospace, pneumatic, and hydraulic industries worldwide. Our commitment to precision engineering and innovative manufacturing processes has established us as a trusted partner for companies seeking reliable brass components.
highlights: Dedicated R&D Team for Product Innovation
